newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-Pilkington cut at Goldman.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Pilkington cut at Goldman.

text.p: Glassmaker Pilkington Plc was cut to "market performer" from "market outperformer" at Goldman Sachs, the investment bank said on Wednesday.
Goldman also lowered its earnings per share estimates for the company by an average 15 percent.
Further detail was not immediately available.
